backend.medicalservice.AdminClerk.services

Interface DoctorService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoctorServiceImpl

    public interface DoctorService
    This service interface defines the operations related to doctor management.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDoctor(DoctorEO doctor)
      Add a new doctor entity to the system.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> allDepartments()
      Retrieve a list of all departments available in the system.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> allEmails()
      Retrieve a list of all email addresses belonging to doctors in the system.
      void deleteDoctor(java.lang.String email)
      Delete a doctor entity using their email address.
      java.util.List<DoctorEO> getAllDoctors()
      Retrieve a list of all doctor entities.

      Retrieve a doctor entity using their email address.

      Retrieve a list of doctor entities based on their department.

      Update an existing doctor entity using their email address.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllDoctors

        java.util.List<DoctorEO> getAllDoctors()
        Retrieve a list of all doctor entities.
        Returns:
        A list containing all doctor entities in the system.

      • addDoctor

        void addDoctor(DoctorEO doctor)
        Add a new doctor entity to the system.
        Parameters:
        doctor - The doctor entity to be added.

      • updateDoctorByEmail

        void updateDoctorByEmail(java.lang.String email,
                         DoctorEO updatedDoctor)
        Update an existing doctor entity using their email address.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the doctor to be updated.
        updatedDoctor - The updated doctor entity.

      • deleteDoctor

        void deleteDoctor(java.lang.String email)
        Delete a doctor entity using their email address.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the doctor to be deleted.

      • getDoctorByEmail

        DoctorEO getDoctorByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Retrieve a doctor entity using their email address.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the doctor to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The doctor entity associated with the provided email, or null if not found.

      • allEmails

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> allEmails()
        Retrieve a list of all email addresses belonging to doctors in the system.
        Returns:
        A list of all email addresses associated with doctors.

      • getDoctorsByDepartment

        java.util.List<DoctorEO> getDoctorsByDepartment(java.lang.String department)
        Retrieve a list of doctor entities based on their department.
        Parameters:
        department - The department for which to retrieve doctors.
        Returns:
        A list of doctor entities associated with the provided department.

      • allDepartments

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> allDepartments()
        Retrieve a list of all departments available in the system.
        Returns:
        A list of all department names.
